name: Bläh Bird 3
description:
Over-fished oceans leave seagulls no option, but to conquer new habitats on their search for food: The aquariums! Adapting to their new environment, they gained self-inflation as a new ability. Use this new skill wisely to trap the prey and secure the survival of your species!

Click and hold to inflate the seagulls and trap the fishies!

A Game made by
Annika Neumann (Programming),
Lukas Hort (Programming),
Clara Müller (Art), and 
Laura Hantschel (Art).
in cooperation with HAW Hamburg.
